posts.post_content:
This is more along the lines of how I expect the average 100+ year old card to look.  They've lasted thru World Wars, depressions, recessions, kids playing with them and storing in their back pockets.  Seems to be too many that are EX or better shape with barely more than an edge nick.  Mother Nature wouldn't allow a card to stay so well preserved!

Nice cards Lee, good luck with the sale!
Rob
:)
I'll throw out there, if the lots don't go, I'm looking for Phila cards.  Looks like you have 3 in there.
